title: GET/campaign/results schema
description: response from GET/campaign/results with params: campaign_id, optional start_date, end_date

campaign_end_date.description: isoformat for datetime valid date format 2012-01-19 17:21:00 UTC

rejection_text.description: if rejection_type==OTHER, this might be non-null

additionalProperties.description: influencer_to_stats is a dict from influencer email (key is influener email) to a stats object with the following properties

n_campaigns.description: number of campaigns this influencer is taking part of in this business

n_products.description: number of products this user is influencer for in this business

n_leads_generated.description: total number of leads generated by this influencer

n_views_generated.description: total number of views generated by this influencer for this business

total_earned.description: total amount of earnings by this influencer for this business

earnings_currency.description: currency of the earnings for this influener

total_cashed.description: total earnings cashed already by influencer

total_balance.description: total earnings still not cased by influencer

member_since.description: datetime format valid date format 2012-01-19 17:21:00 CST

last_activity.description: datetime format valid date format 2012-01-19 17:21:00 CST
